title: Is This A Big Part of Exploding Autoimmune Conditions?
cleaned_text:
Researcher and author Neil Miller discusses the connection between the rise in autoimmune conditions and something that's been added to many vaccines in recent decades.

In order to keep our content free, some of the links may be affiliate links to trusted websites. Shopping through them will bring a small commission to iHealthTube.com. Read our full affiliate disclaimer for more info.
